name: Payments
solutions: Check payment gateway for transaction status.
Advise user to contact their bank.
Issue a refund for duplicate charges.

name: App Issues
solutions: Advise user to restart the app.
Check for known outages on the status page.

name: Booking Problems
solutions: Review booking details and property listing.

name: Acme+
solutions: Verify subscription status in the user's account.
Check for payment issues related to the subscription.

name: Seller Issues
solutions: Guide seller through the listing management tools.
Check for platform-side issues affecting seller accounts.
Escalate to the partner support team.

name: Buyer Issues
solutions: Help buyer navigate the booking process.
